snippet.title: The Last Spell - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist the game now on Steam! 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1105670/The_Last_Spell/

A Dark Fantasy Tactical RPG with Rogue Lite elements
This is the end. War and a bunch of crazy mages provoked The Cataclysm. Only a few Havens keep up the fight against the Hordes of bloodthirsty monsters who come out at night from this strange purple mist.

You lead a group of hardened warriors whose only purpose in life is to desperately defend the last of the mages while they try to cast The Last Spell, and banish all magic from this world. And maybe save us all. Maybe.

The Last Spell is a new game by CCCP, the developers of survival/management games Dead in Bermuda and Dead in Vinland.

Music by Rémi Gallego / The Algorithm https://thealgorithm.bandcamp.com/

Coming to PC/MAC in 2020.

Official Website : http://lastspell.com/
Facebook: http://facebook.com/deadingames/
Twitter: http://twitter.com/deadingames/
Discord: https://discord.gg/cccp/
